message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I would like to counterpropose a price of $95 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I would like to counteroffer at $100 for the product.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $100, Bob. I can offer you a deal at $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
